body.description: Product Description Only Playtex Sport Tampons have a 360° design and FlexFit technology that moves the way you move. Playtex Sport Tampons are great tampons for swimming, biking, running or whatever your activity of choice is. Playtex Sport Tampons Unscented, feature 360 SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION tampon designed to fit your body and its every move for a protective leakage barrier. with unique FLEXFIT interlocking FIBERS Playtex Sport tampons work quickly to TRAP LEAKS. The contoured applicator of Playtex Sport Tampons allow for COMFORTABLE, precise placement. Playtex Sport Tampons Unscented Super Plus Absorbency, keeping you protected throughout your period. Playtex Sport Tampons - PLAY ON! Brand Story By Playtex From the Manufacturer Designed to give active women extra protection during exercise and other activities. View larger.Playtex Sport with FlexFit fibers Protection for Bodies in Motion 360° Sport Level Protection tampon design to fit your body and its every move for a protective leakage barrier. FlexFit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. 2-layers of interlocking fibers to protect against leakages. Contoured applicator for comfortable, precise placementWhat's in the Box Playtex Sport Tampons, Unscented, Super Plus (36 count).Playtex Sport Unscented TamponsRegular 36 ct.Super 36 ct.Super Plus 36 ct.Playtex Sport Body WipesSinglesTravel PackTampons are associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Please consult the product insert for further information. WARNING SIGNS OF TSS ARE, FOR EXAMPLE, SUDDEN FEVER (USUALLY 102° F OR MORE), VOMITING, DIARRHEA, FAINTING OR NEAR FAINTING WHEN STANDING UP, DIZZINESS, OR A RASH THAT LOOKS LIKE A SUNBURN. IF THESE SIGNS OR OTHER SIGNS OF TSS APPEAR, YOU SHOULD REMOVE THE TAMPON AT ONCE, DISCONTINUE USE, AND SEE YOUR DOCTOR IMMEDIATELY. IMPORTANT FACTS ABOUT TSS:There is risk of TSS to all women using tampons during their menstrual period. TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. There are scientific studies that have concluded that tampons contribute to the cause of TSS. The reported risks are higher to women under 30 years of age and teenage girls. The incidence of TSS is estimated to be between 1 and 17 cases of TSS per 100,000 menstruating women and girls per year. REDUCING YOUR RISK OF TSS:You can reduce the risk of developing TSS during your period by alternating tampons with feminine pads. You can avoid any possible risk of getting tampon-associated TSS by not using tampons. There are scientific studies which have concluded that higher absorbency tampons increase the risk of TSS. You should select the minimum absorbency needed to control your flow to reduce the risk of developing TSS. Tampons are available in a range of absorbencies: Regular Absorbency (6-9 grams), Super Absorbency (9-12 grams) and Super Plus Absorbency (12-15 grams). Each absorbency range represents the grams of fluid that can be absorbed by all manufacturers' tampons based on a standardized laboratory test. Use this information to compare the absorbency of these tampons to other brands. If you have had warning signs of TSS in the past, you should check with your doctor before using tampons again. Consult your doctor if you have any questions about tampon use and TSS. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product that I used to use was discontinued. This is an "okay" replacement. Some occasional discomfort but better than any other option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable performance and comfort!
reviews.reviewText: These tampons provide a hassle-free experience, allowing you to confidently tackle your daily activities without worrying about leaks or discomfort. One of the standout features of the Playtex Sport Tampons is their super plus absorbency level. This high level of absorbency makes them ideal for heavy flow days, providing excellent protection against leaks. Whether you're running, working out, or simply going about your daily routine, these tampons offer reliable and long-lasting performance, giving you peace of mind throughout the day. The tampon expands to fit your body, adapting to your movements without causing discomfort. This flexibility allows for comfortable wear during various activities, even during intense workouts or while participating in sports.The Playtex Sport Tampons come with a sturdy plastic applicator that makes insertion easy and convenient. The applicator glides smoothly, reducing any potential discomfort during use. Its compact design is perfect for on-the-go use, fitting discreetly into pockets or purses, so you can have them readily available whenever needed. One of the most appealing aspects of these tampons is their fragrance-free feature. They are free from unnecessary scents, which can be irritating to sensitive skin. This ensures a gentle and irritation-free experience for users who have allergies or sensitivities.The Playtex Sport Tampons are conveniently packaged in a 36-count box, providing an ample supply for an entire cycle. The packaging is sturdy and easy to open, allowing for quick access to the tampons when needed. It also includes clear instructions, making them user-friendly for both new and experienced tampon users. Overall, Playtex Sport Tampons, deliver on their promises of reliable protection, comfort, and ease of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easier to grab
reviews.reviewText: I usually use the Tampax tampons and I love them. But I got these because they were cheap and in an emergency. I might actually switch to these. I love that these have a little knot on the end at the string which makes it easier to grab.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 teenage active girls
reviews.reviewText: These are the only tampons my girls can use without leakage because they are so active in sports.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite tampons!!
reviews.reviewText: These tampons are the only tampons I will ever use. I am a competitive dancer, snowboarder and surfer and these tampons have never let me down. It is easy to use, leak-proof and very comfortable!! Even on my very heavy days, it has never leaked and made me not worry about my period as much!! These tampons lets me wear light-colored pants even when I'm on my period and lets me forget that I'm even on my period!!I will never go back to other brands, and these are the BEST tampons ever!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these tampons because they slide right in and it doesn't hurt and they are very comfortable like you have nothing on. I bought 2 boxes.

This was advertised as Playtex Super Plus Tampons; instead i was sent Tampax, which I strongly dislike. The misrepresentation of the product is unappreciated.Update: After contacting the seller and Amazon Customer Service, the seller is making this right and sending the correct product. It took about a week, but it is getting resolved. I will order from this seller again as we all make mistakes sometimes.
I bought them because they came cheaper then WalmartGood as always
Collect thy blood spilt from the reef taco as intended. 10/10 would recommend for anyone bleeding profusely, whether monthly or accidentally.

Plusieurs commentaires sur le fait qu'une seule boîte avait été livré. Je ny ai pas fait attention. J'ai reçu mon colis aujourd'hui... et il ny avait qu'une seule boîte. Dans la description cest bien écrit 2 boîtes de 18. Très déçue.

I used another for ages but saw these on Amazon and decided to give them a try. They work really well! Easy to use, comfortable, and most importantly, leak proof. I find them to be very absorbent since they do open up into a sort of umbrella shape. Perfect for those heavy days! Personally, I find they actually work better than other brands. The price is decent too! I recommend them based on my experience and will buy again. But every woman is different, so you don't know until you try. Good luck! 5 stars.
